title: Decisions, decisions (NP)
brief_description: Illustrates some of the problems an office manager can come up against if he fails to approach decision making and implementation in a logical manner. Demonstrates how important it is for managers to use the knowledge and views of their team when deciding on matters that affect the team. Famous decision makers from the past, Brutus, Queen Elizabeth I, Churchill, Montgomery act as a review panel and confront an incompetent manager with his mistakes. Features John Cleese. FOR USE ONLY IN A DOMESTIC SITUATION OR FOR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY.
